{{cpp/experimental/atomic_weak_ptr/title|operator weak_ptr&lt;T&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/concurrency/atomic_weak_ptr/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | 
operator weak_ptr&lt;T&gt;() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Atomically loads and returns the current value of the {{tt|atomic_weak_ptr}}. Equivalent to {{c|load()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current value of the {{tt|atomic_weak_ptr}}.
